0: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall. -Nelson Mandela
1: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing. -Walt Disney
2: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor. -Eleanor Roosevelt
3: If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough. -Oprah Winfrey
4: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration. -Thomas Edison
5: Life is a learning experience, only if you learn. -Yogi Berra
6: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without. -Buddha
7: What you give is what you get. -Byron Pulsifer
8: Life is change. Growth is optional. Choose wisely. -Karen Clark
9: You'll see it when you believe it. -Wayne Dyer
10: Today is the tomorrow we worried about yesterday. -Lao Tzu
11: Having nothing, nothing can he lose. -William Shakespeare
